name: Land For Me
description:
A pencil coloured and simple stitchery pattern, depicting my local region, Gippsland. 

Using simple colouring techniques and basic back stitch in a single colour, you can create the entire design or individual panels for framing.

Each individual stitchery measures 6in x 4in and frame required for complete project requires a 7in x 20in window.

Overseas customers: Please email me requesting your order as shipping costs can vary from $1.35 to $4.30 per pattern.

name: Forever Friends
description:
A pattern of a pair of friends to stitch and sew. This pattern has been popular as a gift for that special friend.

I have used Gutermann Sulky threads to create this stitchery, but you can subsitute the threads for a similar result, using DMC Stranded embroidery threads. Requires a frame to complete with a 14in window.

Finished Size: 14in square

Overseas customers: Please email me requesting your order as shipping costs can vary from $1.35 to $4.30 per pattern.

name: Merry Wrens
description:
This pattern for a fun and quirky Christmas stitchery is simple and a joy to make. Each wren has its own unique character and I have used a variegated thread to stitch with. 

The felt, penant swag also comes with extra letters to trace and make the word "Christmas". 

The stitchery requires a frame with a 14in square window.      The swag measures 6 1/2in high x 45in (from first to last penant).

Overseas customers: Please email me requesting your order as shipping costs can vary from $1.35 to $4.30 per pattern.

name: The Hexagon Pinnies
description:
A pattern for a pair of vintage style pin cushions, made from hand pieced hexagons in two different styles. 

The plump pincushions I have fondly named "pinnies" are a great accessory to the sewing table and are very simple and quick to create.

The pattern features a software generated pattern sheet and diagrams. 

This pattern is the first in a collection of patterns only available from my store.

Finished sizes: Flower Pinni: 10in wide
                        Retro Pinni: 5in wide 

Overseas customers: Please email me requesting your order as shipping costs can vary from $1.35 to $4.30 per pattern.

name: Antique Flower Tile
description:
A pattern for a stitchery inspired by a Moroccan tile.

The stitchery is completely backstitched making it simple to create and is embellished with tiny seed beads and pencil/ crayon coloured areas.

By changing the background fabric, threads and beads you can adapt it to suit any decor.

The pattern comes with a software generated pattern sheet and is part of collection of patterns exclusive to my store.

Finished size: 15cm square

Overseas customers: Please email me requesting your order as shipping costs can vary from $1.35 to $4.30 per pattern.
